alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 16 at 4:47AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN FLAGLER...SOUTHEASTERN ST. JOHNS AND SOUTHEASTERN PUTNAM COUNTIES THROUGH 515 AM EST... At 446 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pomona Park, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Bunnell, Crescent City, Pomona Park, Andalusia, Marineland, Fruitland, Crescent Beach, Welaka, and Beverly Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
